data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I think that it will be userful, to be made a module called
    CGI::ParseForm.pm, because: + parsing parameters which have come
    from the input data + after the parse procedure is done, some
    variables can be globalized, depending on a export filer which have
    to limit globalization process, ex. some variables may come from
    get, others from post etc. + passing scalars,arrays and hashes ex.
    @some_array, $hash_element{'test'}

    all we can make this world perfect! :)) Best regards and good luck!
    Svetoslav Marinov
